original_title: 3年前に寿退社した出戻り元上司を出張先ホテルで3日間ずっと犯し続けた記録 星宮一花
overview: Ichika used to be a boss but retired. 3 years passed and her husband has lost her job so she returns to the company to support the family. But things changed and her old subordinate is now her new boss. And he plots to bang Ichika in a hotel-room using a series of complicated excuses. It was all worth it.
title: 3 Years Ago My Lady Boss Retired To Get Married, But Now That She’s Back, I Spent 3 Days At A Hotel During My Business Trip Fucking Her Brains Out, And Here’s The Video Record To Prove It Ichika Hoshimiya
